content.rendered:
[vc_row one_page_section=”yes” one_page_label=”Home” one_page_slug=”home” css=”.vc_custom_1645049739001{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1645049749205{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][rev_slider_vc alias=”hospital-1″ el_class=”no-margin-bottom”][slider_navigation][slider_navigation_el icon_type=”icon_image” image=”26″ title=”HEALTH CARE” description=”Providing care for the elderly in long and short term basis” imagesize=”80×80″][slider_navigation_el icon_type=”icon_image” image=”18″ title=”DIETARY & NUTRITION SERVICES” description=”Providing a well-balanced diet with the right amount of nutrients” imagesize=”80×80″][slider_navigation_el icon_type=”icon_image” image=”258″ title=”SOCIAL REHABILITATION” description=”Progressively formulate orthogonal web services before best-of-breed systems.” imagesize=”80×80″][slider_navigation_el icon_type=”icon_image” image=”262″ title=”DAY CARE” description=”We provide special Home care service for our residents senior citizens.” imagesize=”80×80″][/slider_navigation][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row one_page_section=”yes” one_page_label=”About us” one_page_slug=”about-us” css=”.vc_custom_1645049806305{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

ABOUT WINISEPH

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”12″ img_size=”520×300″ css_animation=”bounceIn”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

We provide a planned programme of activities to promote the health and social well being of senior citizens on a day to day basis; and short-stay residential care for the elderly in a friendly and supportive environment.

In an era when children and close relatives are busy with careers and raising their own families, the traditional support system for senior citizens has become dysfunctional, especially in the cities. As a result, senior citizens get very lonely and long for an outlet for social interaction with their peers.

It is often not easy for busy professionals or entrepreneurs to take care of an elderly relative in their own homes as some may require a lot of attention and care.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

WINISEPH CARE HOME helps provide the physical, social and emotional needs of the elderly.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650825026857{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ vertical_align=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1645050399121{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650823334436{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”margin4x”]

CARE

We strive to provide the best level of care, tailored to individual needs and wishes by our experienced, friendly and enthusiastic team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4″ css=”.vc_custom_1645050377190{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650823348452{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”margin4x”]

COMFORT

We provide our residents support, encouragement, cheer and fellow feeling in good times and emotional times.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4″ css=”.vc_custom_1645050421257{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650823362369{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”margin4x”]

COMPANIONSHIP

Our residents, their loved ones and our teams are never alone in their journey with us.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1660948768152{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column vertical_align=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1454040146385{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650823277920{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”margin4x”]

HEALTH SERVICE

We have trained nurses and carers who provide a wide range of services including post-acute care, observation and monitoring, assessment, management, and administration of medication, Wound care and Pain management.

WINISEPH CARE HOME is conceptualised to meet the physical,  social and emotional needs of the elderly and the expectations of their loving children and relatives:  A holistic approach to caring for the person is central to our guiding principles.

[/vc_column_text][vc_cta h2=”Our guiding principles.” h4=”A holistic approach to caring for Elders” txt_align=”center” style=”custom” custom_background=”#900000″ custom_text=”#ffcd00″][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” one_page_section=”yes” one_page_label=”Services” one_page_slug=”services” css=”.vc_custom_1660948580680{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f4b300 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”img-center-top”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1433903791128{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650809620313{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”]

OUR SERVICES

Care tailored to you

In an era when children and close relatives are busy with careers and raising their own families, the traditional support system for senior citizens is dysfunctional, especially in the cities. As a result, the elderly get very lonely and long for an outlet for social interaction with their peers.  Also, it is often not easy for busy professionals or entrepreneurs to take care of an elderly relative in their own homes as some may require a lot of attention and care as much as 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.

We want our residents to feel supported and enjoy their stay with us, so we take the time to really get to know them. We work with our residents and their families to create an individual care plan which provides details on every element of day-to-day life, identifying key areas where help is needed and ensuring residents’ preferred routines can be maintained

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1434352226579{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][tt_service_box icon_type=”icon_image” image=”26″ title=”MEDICAL CHECK UP” desc=”Peroidial Medical Check up for our residence” imagesize=”62×57″ description=”Vestibulum facilisis rhoncus tempor. Duis non ipsum volutpat, rhoncus nisi sed, pulvinar ex.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][tt_service_box icon_type=”icon_image” image=”259″ title=”SOCIAL REHABILITATION” desc=”A periodic checkup or screening helps detect, diagnose and manage diseases.” description=”Vestibulum facilisis rhoncus tempor. Duis non ipsum volutpat, rhoncus nisi sed, pulvinar ex.” imagesize=”63×57″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][tt_service_box icon_type=”icon_image” image=”258″ title=”RECREATION” desc=”Physical activity helps Senior citizens gain more muscle strength and improve coordination and balance. We encourage simple daily walks, stretches and appropriate chair exercises” imagesize=”57×57″ description=”Vestibulum facilisis rhoncus tempor. Duis non ipsum volutpat, rhoncus nisi sed, pulvinar ex.”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1434352239555{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][tt_service_box icon_type=”icon_image” image=”257″ title=”NUTRITION BALANCE” desc=”A well-balanced diet is an important part of staying healthy for senior citizens. Eatig a wide variety of foods from the five food groups helps” imagesize=”57×57″ description=”Vestibulum facilisis rhoncus tempor. Duis non ipsum volutpat, rhoncus nisi sed, pulvinar ex.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][tt_service_box icon_type=”icon_image” image=”26″ title=”HOME CARE” desc=”We offer a range of home care services for Senior citizens.” imagesize=”70×57″ description=”Vestibulum facilisis rhoncus tempor. Duis non ipsum volutpat, rhoncus nisi sed, pulvinar ex.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][tt_service_box icon_type=”icon_image” image=”262″ title=”DAY CARE” desc=”Our facility is open for daycare operations, with qualified health practitioners available to help with your needs.” imagesize=”70×57″ description=”Vestibulum facilisis rhoncus tempor. Duis non ipsum volutpat, rhoncus nisi sed, pulvinar ex.”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” one_page_section=”yes” one_page_label=”News” one_page_slug=”news” css=”.vc_custom_1660948172906{background-color: #d8d8d8 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1660948291899{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”]

NEWS

What We Have Being Doing

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Social Welfare Integrated Program Initiative

Training Impact – Winner

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”custom” align=”align_left” accent_color=”#d10000″][vc_single_image image=”327″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1660947092013{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”]

Winispehcarehome Team recently won Best Presentation at the  Social Welfare Integrated Program Initiative event held on the 6th of July 2022.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_images_carousel images=”319,318,317,316,315,314,313″ img_size=”large” autoplay=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1660946608597{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”]

Due to the current increase in the cost of living a few of our daily expenses and policies have changed.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” one_page_section=”yes” one_page_label=”Caring” one_page_slug=”caring”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1660947077614{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”text-light”]

Sharing Care & Love

[/vc_column_text][vc_media_grid grid_id=”vc_gid:1660948669306-cb7791f0-3adb-5″ include=”276,275,274,273,271,270″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row one_page_section=”yes” one_page_label=”Contact” one_page_slug=”contact” css=”.vc_custom_1433909487083{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 133px !important;padding-bottom: 126px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

HOW TO FIND US

326 Adeyemo Akapo Street, Omole Residential Estate,

Phase 1, Ojodu, Beger,

Lagos

[/vc_column_text][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

ADDRESS

326 Adeyemo Akapo Street, Omole Residential Estate, Phase 1, Ojodu, Berger, Lagos

CALL US

+2347039466553

+2348097132509

EMAIL

info@winisephcarehome.com.ng[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]
